article_title: This Week Panel: Does Obama Want a Government Shutdown for Electoral Gains?
comment_texts:
A shutdown will happen, and the Repubs are too stupid and brainless that Obama 
will be able to turn this into his advantage. When this happens, the Dems will
take back Congress in 2014 and our country will be done!!! No worthwhile
Republican leader has stepped up so far...how sad and pathetic.

explanation: The comment does not mention global warming.
The comment does not mention fossil fuels.
The comment does not mention God.
The comment does not mention church.
The comment states that 'Obama will be able to turn this into his advantage.'
The comment does not mention Trump.
The comment describes Republicans as 'too stupid and brainless' and states that 'No worthwhile Republican leader has stepped up so far...how sad and pathetic.'
The comment states that 'the Dems will take back Congress in 2014'.
The comment does not mention immigration.
The comment does not mention taxes.
The comment does not mention the European Union.
The comment does not mention Social Security.
The comment does not mention Harry Potter.
The comment does not mention soccer.
